name: DOJ: Public Safety Officers' Educational Assistance Program
description: Financial assistance for higher education to spouses and children of police, fire, and emergency public safety officers killed in the line of duty.
fullDescription: Financial assistance for higher education to spouses and children of police, fire, and emergency public safety officers killed in the line of duty.
whatTheyOffer: Offers financial and educational support to help families of fallen public safety officers.
howToGetIt:
Eligibility requirements:
- The deceased was a public safety officer who died in the line of duty
